title: Hi there! I'm Dandun,
body:
a software developer living in beautiful cold city Banjarnegara, Indonesia. I became a software developer because I'm drawn to a dynamic career that combines my spark for learning and helping others.


When I am not coding, I can be found hanging out with my cats, playing badminton, jamming in music studio, browsing memes, or watching anime.

title: Frontend and beyond.
body: While I have dabbled in various languages and frameworks, I have landed on JavaScript and React as my go-to technology. I spend most of my time on the frontend stack but I enjoy working on the backend as well.
